imprint.legal: Legal information according to ยง 5 TMG

aboutMe.headline: About me
aboutMe.introduction: As a Junior Frontend Developer with skills in JavaScript and Angular, I am passionate about building interactive and user-friendly web applications. My portfolio showcases projects I've done independently and with teams, focusing on clean code and responsive design.
aboutMe.firstParagraph: My interest in software development started while running an online store, where I built my own website using a website builder. This sparked my passion for web technologies and led me to further my education in this field. Moving from e-commerce to web development, I've used my attention to detail and problem-solving skills to create smooth digital experiences.
aboutMe.secondParagraph: I'm highly focused and enjoy working in teams, contributing positively to the work environment. I'm eager to grow as a developer and work on innovative projects. If you're looking for a dedicated and creative developer, let's connect and achieve your company's digital goals together.

skills.headline: My Skills
skills.paragraph: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.

portfolioParagraph: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

contact.headline: Contact
contact.paragraph: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.paragraphQuestion: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!
contact.name: Your name
contact.thermsPart2: and agree to processing of my data as outlined.
